title: Online Workshop for Enhancing Statistical Competencies Using Multimodal Learning (Self-Directed)

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental statistical concepts (mean, variance, etc.) and data utilization experience in professional tasks
context.additional_context: A workshop for professionals from diverse job backgrounds to rapidly improve statistical analysis skills. Optimized for hands-on learning environments using digital devices.

learning_goals: Using MATLAB-based visualization tools, learners can accurately describe characteristics of various data distributions with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can design approaches to apply statistical concepts to practical cases by combining multiple representations (text, graphs, formulas).
Through interactive computational modeling, learners can reproduce theoretical procedures of regression analysis/hypothesis testing with real data and interpret results.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
